title: How to Find a Baby Registry on Amazon

steps.title: Go to https://www.amazon.com/baby-reg/search-results.
steps.content: Go to https://www.amazon.com/baby-reg/search-results . You can use any web browser to search for a baby registry.

steps.title: Enter the first or last name or email address that would be associated with the registry.
steps.content: Enter the first or last name or email address that would be associated with the registry. You'll see these text fields under the header "Find a Baby Registry." You can enter information into the city, state, and arrival date text fields to narrow your search.

steps.title: Click Search.
steps.content: Click Search . After you click Search , a list of results will display on the right side of the page.

steps.title: Click a registrant's name to see the baby registry.
steps.content: Click a registrant's name to see the baby registry. The registry will open in a new list and show you how many of the listed items have been purchased as well as how long until the expected arrival date. [1] X Research source Click an item in the list to add that item to your cart. Items you add while using the registry will update the registry purchase history.
